C

Client - Class in ws2d.core.generic
A wrapper for a ServerWebSocket that allows for connection verification.
Client(ServerWebSocket) - Constructor for class ws2d.core.generic.Client
Constructs a new instance of Client with a server web socket.
Command - Class in ws2d.core.command
The base class for all server commands in Ws2D.
Command(String...) - Constructor for class ws2d.core.command.Command
Constructs a new instance of Command with the specified aliases.
CommandException - Exception in ws2d.core.command
This class defines an exception that is to be thrown if an error occurs while processing a command.
CommandException(String) - Constructor for exception ws2d.core.command.CommandException
Constructs a new instance of CommandException with a detail message.
CommandException() - Constructor for exception ws2d.core.command.CommandException
Constructs a new instance of CommandException without a detail message.
CommandHandler - Class in ws2d.core.command
Handles the console input and the processing of commands.
CommandHandler(Server) - Constructor for class ws2d.core.command.CommandHandler
Constructs a new instance of CommandHandler with the current running instance of the server.
CommandStop - Class in ws2d.core.command
Stops the current running instance of Ws2D.
CommandStop() - Constructor for class ws2d.core.command.CommandStop
Constructs a new instance of CommandStop.
complete - Variable in class ws2d.core.generic.TaskBase
Whether or not the task is finished.
Config - Class in ws2d.init
The configuration class for Ws2D.
Config(JsonObject) - Constructor for class ws2d.init.Config
Constructs a new instance of Config with an optional JsonObject that can override default settings.
copy(InputStream, File, int) - Static method in class ws2d.util.FileSystem
Directs the data in an input stream through a buffer to the specified destination file.
copy(InputStream, File) - Static method in class ws2d.util.FileSystem
Directs the data in an input stream through a buffer with a size of 65536 to the specified destination file.
copyDir(File, File, int) - Static method in class ws2d.util.FileSystem
Copies a directory to another location.
copyFile(File, File, int) - Static method in class ws2d.util.FileSystem
Copies a source file to a destination file with a specified buffer size.
createFile(File) - Static method in class ws2d.util.FileSystem
Creates a file and any parent directories as well.
